column4: Ok Ive got one of my HDs mounted but it's permissions are listed as root. I did sudo chown -hR brandon:brandon /media/disk, but it didnt change the permissions. What do I need to do?
I put it in the fstab earlier
the user is set by the "mount" options you use when issuing the mount command manually, or when fstab is read, so check your fstab and also read the mount manual
